verses.name: Ephesians 6:1
verses.text: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:2
verses.text: Honour thy father and mother; (which is the first commandment with promise;)

verses.name: Ephesians 6:3
verses.text: That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:4
verses.text: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:5
verses.text: Servants, be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;
